name: LB-Attack
description:
A little Demo i made using Godot as a first game. its about the immune system fighting off bacteria in the blood while you avoid   red blood cells .it still has some issues  some of them fundamental to how i made the game and some  i just do not know what causes them (example : the rest button sometimes works and sometimes it does not and to fix that you either press restart again or reboot. )and i have removed randomization because i had an issue with something il re-add it later. this is just a test and i would gladly take feedback and thank you for your Time.

 i made all the assets besides the Crt-tv effect shader the credit goes to:

hiulit

his page:

https://github.com/hiulit/Godot-3-2D-CRT-Shader
